name: Momoko IO
description:
- GAME
It's a hard core Highscore game. Survive as long as possible. Your only weapon is a sword. Use it to kill enemies and increase your kill counter!

- GOAL
Break your kill count highscore game after game!

- HINT
There are white small "Onigiri" (rice balls) on the ground. When eaten the sword length increases giving the player an ever growing benefit towards the enemies!
